issue.title: [R] Split up test-dataset.R and test-dplyr.R
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13890](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13890). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It's 1700 lines long and growing. One natural way to split is by file format (parquet, csv).

comments.body:
